about.title: About
paragraphs: I am a Senior Full-Stack Engineer who doesn't just write code—I architect systems that scale. With over 4.5 years of experience, I specialize in bridging the gap between high-performance backends and seamless, conversion-driven frontends.

My approach balances technical depth with business impact. At Pickyourtrail, I architected a high-scale booking flow that drove a 150% increase in conversions. Prior to that, I focused on heavy infrastructure at Codedamn, where I optimized container pipelines to slash operational costs by 55%.

Beyond the 9-to-5, I build complex distributed systems. I architected 'Artemis' (an AI OS using RabbitMQ and Vector DBs) and 'WatchWithMe' (a P2P streaming platform serving 3,000+ users). I function best in roles where I can own the end-to-end architecture—from the database schema to the pixel-perfect UI.
